 2005-03162005-03-10FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActFederal-Provincial Fiscal Arrangements Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the FEDERAL-PROVINCIAL FISCAL ARRANGEMENTS REGULATIONS, 1999 which provide for the adjustment of recovery schedules, the closure of current open fiscal years to implement a new Equalization Framework, the maximum per capita loan recovery limit and a repayable floor election mechanism.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2005-0054 Publication Date: 2005-03-23
